data.text: @ReevesBatverse @TheBatmanFilm_ @Variety @DEADLINE Opening weekend. I think it should be profitable by the end of Week 1.

@TheBatmanFilm_ @Variety @DEADLINE Not claiming people are saying lies or anything. But who officially said 100 million? I thought same thing, but I just saw on the Wikipedia. Not sure if it was actually from a trade.

@DrRossGeller_ @TheBatmanFilm_ @Variety @DEADLINE the initial budget was a 100m cause they were planning to shoot everything on real locations.. but w/ covid, they had to build many practical sets... i remember robert mentioning that they built sets that could cover blocks of an area
